website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for luxury, this decanter is tough to beat.
cons: An aeration and filtration unit would be a welcome addition

customer_reviews.title: Very good decanter
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd bought this the first time. The first decanter I had was a cheap one from a local box store and it worked well enough, till it broke. This one seems much more durable, the neck is actually round (and so works with a glass stopper) and it has yet to stain, even though we've been using it for months. Our last decanter started to stain after a month and needed to be cleaned much more often. So far we've been using this for 4-5 months and have yet to see any stains.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Pourly designed
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through two of these. There are a couple design flaws that made me give this a one star, especially for $40. It does not pour all that well, and both of ours have chipped right on the pouring lip so we hesitate to use them anymore for safety reasons. (Who wants to drink shards of glass?) We have been very careful hand washing it, etc. and it seems like one tiny little tap chips the glass on the pouring edge. For "thick glass", it does not seem like very good quality in our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, Until it Broke
customer_reviews.text: This item was used by me twice. I hand washed it after each use and found it severely cracked upon drying after its second use. I have no idea what would have caused this, but I left it drying over night and when I looked at it in the morning it was unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best decanter we have
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is awesome. I can pour a bottle of red in and swirl it around like crazy without a single drop coming out. It's very attractive and decants well. We use the large Ravenscroft Crystal Decanter Ball Stopper with it, and they fit perfectly together. My only qualm, which doesn't affect my rating, is that I have a small chip at the mouth of the decanter - not sure how that happened.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and affordable
customer_reviews.text: We gave this decanter as a gift. It was greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: slahood

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and works well but hard to clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This decanter has a pleasant shape/weight with a nice wide base for aeration
customer_reviews.text: This decanter has a pleasant shape/weight with a nice wide base for aeration. Pouring the final glass is a little tricky to do without the wine spiraling around the neck and splashing out on the table.
customer_reviews.author: A. McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Love this Decanter!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wine decanter. It's got a beautiful shape and I use it for every bottle of red I open. You do have to be careful when cleaning or moving since the glass is not that thick, but it's a minor inconvenience for a good product. I use the glass stopper with it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun with wine
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product. I am not a "wine enthusiast" (yet), and will use this review to state the following: It looks very cool. It is very fun to use. I can not wait for the next time to have people to show it off (and drink wine). Does it improve the taste? I don't know. That may be the point, but I'm more excited about being able to pour a whole lot of wine into this fancy glass container and then shake it up vigorously without fear of spilling (it is very difficult, nay, impossible to spill any wine unless you make a serious attempt to do so: that's how well this thing works). 5 stars indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Zur goldenen Ehrhoernchen

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, sturdy decanter. The final pour is somewhat difficult because, as previous purchases have noted, you must turn the decanter totally upside down. Sometimes wine goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to your home. I never knew how much a decanter could change the texture and taste of a wine until I tried this product. It really smooths out the wine as you go. Pour small glasses, sip slowly, and you will notice the smoothness increase as you finish the bottle. Just be careful pouring that last glass.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality decanter
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this decanter. It is also quite substantial in size and weight. My only issue with it is that it is almost impossible to pour the wine into a wineglass without some of the wine trickling down the side of the decanter.
customer_reviews.author: tn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great decanter for the price. Excellent value. Sturdy, shaped perfectly, fits great with our Wine Enthusiast Decanter Stand. Doesn't look cheap (which was my initial concern). I'd definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Santarem

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much.
customer_reviews.text: Makes me drink more wine than I should. Looks super slick too
customer_reviews.author: Cam Cheline

customer_reviews.title: Nice Decanter....Great Price....
customer_reviews.text: Nice Decanter...Great price...since I break things often, I would know...This is my 3rd one....Not the decanters fault :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Weller

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but thats about it
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed!! the wine decanter is shown with a stainless steel aerator. It describes aerating the wine. Doesn't even suggest purchasing the aerator seperately. Pretty, but thats about it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love it. Fits our style and functions well
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love it. Fits our style and functions well. It does drip just a bit, so have something handy to wipe the rim after pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Leonhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for weddings holidays...wine enthusiasts take note.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this 3x for friends. They all rave about it! Price keeps increasing???
customer_reviews.author: Harry Kasanow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful and is very good quality, and it works!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. Sharing a couple bottles with neighbors made it clear what a difference decanting can make. Look forward to using it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Syracuse

customer_reviews.title: Classy Glass
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful decanter. It will add a touch of class to any table.
customer_reviews.author: abbynme

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further
customer_reviews.text: After an exhausting search for the right decanter for us, this one came out on top. The sizr is perfect. An entire 750ml bottle comes up to the widest part of the bottom, allowing maximum surface area for air. It's light weight without feeling flimsy. It doesn't feel like it'll break in yout hands. It is a little akward pouring the last bit of wine, but that's no big deal. We also ordered the Wine Enthusiest drying stand after our first washing. Would highly recommend both items.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. O. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful but too difficult to clean and dry. Would not recommend except for display.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality too
customer_reviews.text: What a difference it makes. This is the real deal. Great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful decanter, similar to the one I broke
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful decanter, similar to the one I broke, and got this one to replace. It is really large, though-could probably hold a magnum.
customer_reviews.author: Beth D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice decanter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. it IS tricky getting that last bit out because of teh size of teh base but its pretty and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Never bored mama

customer_reviews.title: I love the shape
customer_reviews.text: The glass is heavy duty and much thicker than I anticipated. I love the shape! We use it to smoke whiskey with a smoker we purchased on Amazon for a fun twist!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY !!! False Images show items not included !!! BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Picture Falsely shows the Item with an Airator (SC) It is nothing bit a glass container. DO NOT BUY !!! It is NOT as it seems!!!
customer_reviews.author: W. Scott Boyd

customer_reviews.title: De'cant beat this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this decanter for my mom for Christmas and it can well wrapped and un-broken (something I was really worried about). She uses it quite often and swears by it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice decanter. Heavy and clear and not too difficult to pour. Goes perfectly with the 'drying-stand' I purchased for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cabito

customer_reviews.title: and they love them. I've never heard a complaint
customer_reviews.text: I buy these as gifts for people, and they love them. I've never heard a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Porphyry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and definitely met
customer_reviews.text: Decanter is just as advertised! Great quality and definitely met expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Quality great. Ordered for my father and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: KJshopper

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated at this because while beautiful in design
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated at this because while beautiful in design, it is pictured with the aerator and it does not come with it. False advertisement at its finest
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This decanter is beautiful but not practical
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is beautiful but not practical. It is very hard to pour wine with such a large base. My next decanter will have a pour spout.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Bramlett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I love the way it makes event not ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I love the way it makes event not so good wine better. Caution on pouring that last bit out though. :D
customer_reviews.author: Anna Keller

customer_reviews.title: FALSE PICTURE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FALSE PICTURE!!!!! This only includes the decanter base (ONLY 1 THING INCLUDED). Waist of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas West

customer_reviews.title: Great Decanter
customer_reviews.text: great quality for the price, does what its advertised to do and looks good while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: RL1976

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Elegant - Good the the Last drop
customer_reviews.text: There are really only a few things you need to know about a decanter. Decanting should mimic the process of swirling wine in the glass and the result should be softer tannins in the wine. This decanter will drape wine over the full interior surface. It is both beautiful and effective. Sure it's shape makes pouring the last glass a challenge, but if you put a quality wine in there you are going to get quality out. I am sure you are up to the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Farschman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful decanter, just difficult to clean out the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful decanter, just difficult to clean out the bottom after use. Just the price to pay for great aeration!
customer_reviews.author: S. Barry Eiden

customer_reviews.title: The glass is thicker than the last one from a ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass is thicker than the last one from a different brand that I broke before we could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dunn

customer_reviews.title: The glass was much thicker than I was expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass was much thicker than I was expected. It's not cheap paper thin and should be durable for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Ben F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful design, and it works well
customer_reviews.text: The design itself is what made me purchase this item. I like the fact that it had a wider bottem than others which causes it to look much nicer when the wine poors down the sides. I highly reccomend this product for wine enthusiasts, and for non-wine enthusiasts it's still a nice purchase for you're table. I guarantee you will get many comments on it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and the price is right. Can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: jdlnmia

customer_reviews.title: Vivid wine Decanter
customer_reviews.text: The wine Decanter I just purchased from Amazon. com. is exactly what I wanted. I went to a few stores, however, they did not have what i was look for. A wine decantor needs a very wide bace and Amazon. com had exactly what I was looking for. I hope this helps. best, John R. Tracy.
customer_reviews.author: john r. tracy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very clean looking wine decanter. It holds two bottles of wine very nicely. I am giving it four out of five stars for two reasons; 1) When you finish pouring the wine and set it back on the table it drips down the side. 2) When you pour the very last bit of wine (you are holding the decanter completely upside down) it tends to pour from the entire circle and unless you have a wine glass with a giant opening it spills. I do like the minimalist look of it and it is easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kierstin Carreira

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is ridiculous. 1): it's too thick around the top so pours ALWAYS drip drip drip everywhere, but 2): even more ridiculous - it's so wide at the base that you can't ever get the last couple ounces of wine out of the damned thing unless you turn it completely vertical and swish it around, which of course spills the wine everywhere. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but a little akward
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and does it's job. A little awkward when pouring the last drops out as it needs to be completely upside down.
customer_reviews.author: nikmon

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: Looks great for the price, and works well, as far as we can tell. It does promote more drinking, since it's hard to tell how much (or little) is left. Guess we'll have to start counting glasses consumed.
customer_reviews.author: Grammar fiend

customer_reviews.title: Cracked really easily the first time I used it (around the spout)
customer_reviews.text: Cracked really easily the first time I used it (around the spout); I can use it but not for company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Doc

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price. With this style decanter the last glass requires you turn it upside down. It appears sturdy. Best buy I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Tom N

customer_reviews.title: Like it. Worth
customer_reviews.text: Seems what I wanna buy. Works great, light weights and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Liu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wine Decanter
customer_reviews.text: The decanter is beautiful. It works very well, and looks elegant. I found it easy to pour, and have had compliments. Much prettier when you see if on your counter vs the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design.
customer_reviews.text: We hate this carafe because you cannot pour the remaining wine from the carafe when you have to tip it upright. There is no pour spout shape so the wine clings to the entire throat of the carafe spreading wine everywhere but the glass. We are going to trash it because it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Craig

customer_reviews.title: Wine Enthusiast Vivid Wine Decanter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my parents. It was reasonably priced and is quite elegant. They love it and use it regularly, whether just for themselves or company. It really does make wine taste better when it's decanted.
customer_reviews.author: kari andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is much less expensive than some but does the trick. Be sure to buy the scrubbing brush that you can order separately.
customer_reviews.author: Wine enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Vivid Wine Decanter
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and design of this decanter. I never use this without the stainless steel funnel to aid in decanting. However, the one issue I have with this design is the degree of difficulty in pouring the last class of wine. You have to lift and turn the decanter completely over and one has to be very careful not to spill a little wine. Love the design, just need to work on your wine pouring skills.
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: impossible to pour out the last serving of wine.
customer_reviews.text: This decanter looks nice and is fun to use until you go to pour the last serving, at which point it spills all over! The problem is not the server or the result of too much wine, it happens every time to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn Tubesing

customer_reviews.title: Would have loved to use it but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wine decanter it came it its own box with the entire top smashed and crushed. It was so badly wrapped, I threw it in the bin as I had no easy way to return it. I am sure its a fantastic decanter...................
customer_reviews.author: Mishsb

customer_reviews.title: Came shattered in a million pieces...
customer_reviews.text: Came completely broken in a million pieces and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken...TWICE
customer_reviews.text: This product is probably great, but the packaging is terrible. It arrived broken, and Amazon was great and sent me a new one. It arrived broken a second time, and Amazon again refunded me. I bought the product somewhere else. Due to the time I spent dealing with the returns/refunds I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not crystal
customer_reviews.text: The description of the item was for a crystal decanter. When the box arrived we were disappointed to find out that the decanter was made out of glass.
customer_reviews.author: Galina I

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous decanter!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this decanter! I had a hard time filling it neatly initially, until I realized that I can just completely tip the wine bottle and stand it up in the neck of the decanter - it seems tacky, but it works beautifully and it doesn't splash wine drips all over that way (a huge part of enjoying the decanter is the way it looks - the wine drips on the inside of the neck, etc, detracted terribly) I would absolutely buy this decanter again if anything happens to our current one or I needed a special gift.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: it is not a good value. But it does the wine decanting very ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this a 3 star rating because cleaning and drying the decanter is very difficult. I had to spend additional $30 to purchase the drying stand and the cleaning brushes. When you add it all up, it is not a good value. But it does the wine decanting very well.
customer_reviews.author: Harish Chinai

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, however the measurements are incorrect on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, however the measurements are incorrect on Amazon. The actual website shows the correct dimensions, which is a bit smaller. Although the decanter box states "glass", Amazon and the product website both state it is "crystal". This is a perfect decanter, it has a classy and elegant look for any occasion! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: This product turned out better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product turned out better than I expected. Looks very elegant and functions perfectly. Makes wine taste better than ever. I tried the same wine with the decanter and the aerator. Although aerator is quick and easy it leaves wine tasting bland. The decanter however brings out so much flavor and makes wine taste so much better. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: rabzny

customer_reviews.title: Presentation
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have another aerator, but as good as they are, you have to have a steady hand and use it per glass. This is simple and presents well. I learned the that idea of this is that you create more surface area so the oxygen can do its think with the wine (versus just popping the cork and waiting for the air to do its job through a little hole. People love it. I probably won't use my aerator ever again. Maybe on travel.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Fun for parties. Even more fun to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my mother who hosts lots of parties and she loves it. She says that her guests compliment her on it and she loves that too. Was hoping getting her this would get me an invite to her next party, but unfortunately not. It's ok, I didn't want to go anyway.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bito

customer_reviews.title: No Aerator as shown in primary picture. False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The aerator shown in the picture is not included! No where in the product details does it indicate that it is not included. This is false advertisement. I should have read the reviews but was making a quick purchase for a gift. It's going back. Also, it does not pour well.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Great decanter, it is my first one. My only issue would be is pouring the last remaining wine. I have to turn this completely upside down and hope it doesn't spill all over the place. But overall it is a very good decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: easy to pour
customer_reviews.text: This decanter appears like the shape of many other decanters. But it's far easier to pour. After decanting an entire 750ml bottle into this vessel, it normally becomes very bottom heavy and is a bit challenging to pour into a tall wine glass. Not this one! Very comfortable to use. Would easily buy another as a gift :)
customer_reviews.author: Purchasing Dept

customer_reviews.title: Really lovely, and arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this decanter. I love watching the wine pour through when I use it and find that it pours neatly, and dries fairly well when I wash it. One note: another reviewer talked about how to grip the decanter when pouring the last glass of wine so it wouldn't spill all over -- he was right! There's a trick to it, but practice DOES make perfect and so I have no complaint there. The recommended drying brush is very hard to use, so I wouldn't recommend spending the money on that. Inverting the decanter on a soft cloth seems to do the trick for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect decanter
customer_reviews.text: I had a party a few weeks back and I needed a decanter for my wine. This decanter was perfect for the occassion. The surface area nicely allowed for good aeration of my wine. The decanter is attractive to look at and substantial in weight. Pouring the wine was a breeze. Cleaning the decanter was easy with simple rinsing. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ppdoc123

customer_reviews.title: Glass Decanter, just what i needed and ordered
customer_reviews.text: It's glass, not crystal, but it's nice. If you have friends over for a party who know the difference between a crystal and glass decanter, and they make a big deal of glass being inferior, kick them out of your party.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Might be nice but not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My question is why does the primary product picture include an aerator if it doesn't actually include an aerator... my fault for not reading more closely but it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: L. Remi

customer_reviews.title: a GREAT decanter for the money
customer_reviews.text: a GREAT decanter for the money...the lip combined with the large size makes a dripless pour impossible, but this is a very small problem compared to the overall value of this decanter. looks awesome, and quickly opens up wine.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well-designed
customer_reviews.text: We have the Vinturi wine aerator (Amazon) which works great when opening a bottle of red is a last minute decision. But we wanted something that would present itself well at the dinner table or bar when we had the time to properly decant the wine. The Wine Enthusiast Vivid Decanter is a very attractive work of glass and it holds the typical 750 ml bottle of wine to a level where the maximum surface area is exposed to the air. I can understand other reviewers' comments that it could be difficult to pour, but I just watched what I was doing, and didn't have any problems from the very first pour right up until the last.
customer_reviews.author: G. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Is there any better way to decant that special bottle of "juice" than ...
customer_reviews.text: Is there any better way to decant that special bottle of "juice" than withe a decanter? No, there isn't. This unit from Wine Enthusiast is definitely the way to go. Perfect design to allow maximum surface exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Cb Solo

customer_reviews.title: Be careful...
customer_reviews.text: Much more durable than my previous reidel decanter, but when you get down to the very last sip of wine in the decanter, you have to be extremely careful how you pour, I have already soaked a few guests by accident just trying to pour them the last little bit of wine that was left in the decanter! Great idea, but very poor execution on functionality from wine enthusiast
customer_reviews.author: Tony Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Elegant Decanter
customer_reviews.text: This is the second decanter I've purchased because it makes such a great gift. Both recipients loved it. Only bad thing is it's a little difficult to pour based on the design and weight of the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: MChi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I figured I could not go wrong with Wine Enthusiast, and I was right. This decanter is elegant and sturdy. I love the extra large size. Not cheap, but nowhere near what some cost. Great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: keep looking
customer_reviews.text: It's okay - from the description, I expected a bit better. If I were to recommend, I don't recommend it. It's footprint is quite large and it doesn't air the wine as nicely as others.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to help the wine "breathe". Absolutely need to get a drying stand for it. Forget the crystal ball (I use a Ziploc bag to cover).
customer_reviews.author: Yedidyah

customer_reviews.title: Good, heavy glass
customer_reviews.text: Came as product described. Good, heavy glass. Nice addition to wine drinking.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: great decanter
customer_reviews.text: We already have this same decanter and this purchase was for a gift. It is a classic style, a nice size, and not small like so many others. I like the quality of this decanter, the glass is not too thin where you'd fear you'd break it by washing it.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Large base makes it hard to store but if you buy the dying rack it makes it easier! See pic.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, made a cheap bottle taste like an expensive one in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: perseus1792

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It holds wine and looks pretty... what else do you want? A bit of an engineering project to stand it on its head for drying. You may want to buy a stand for it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Balsam

customer_reviews.title: Effective and handsome
customer_reviews.text: This shape decanter spreads out the surface to expose a lot of your wine to aeration. If you get impatient, the narrow neck allows for safe agitation. Finally, it's handsome. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice decanter
customer_reviews.text: Love this decanter. I have had many but the is a new interpretation of a vintage shape. Good job!!
customer_reviews.author: Jambo

customer_reviews.title: This is great for letting your Cabs really open up!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for letting your Cabs really open up! It is nice quality glass and really adds to the decor of any dining table.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice decanter, but without a spout can deliver a sheet of wine instead of a concentrated pour.
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a wine lover and this is excellent. Got as a gift for my father and he absolutely loves this! Will be buying myself one too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Hen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Love this decanter. Looks good in presentation. Great job decanting wine.
customer_reviews.author: Old Coast Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for christmas. He really likes it and has used it a lot so far. It's a nice size and weight and is perfect for decanting a nice bottle of wine. No cons yet. It hasn't been too difficult to pour (except for the last few drops obviously) and cleaning hasn't been too bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cummings

customer_reviews.title: GET TWO
customer_reviews.text: I got one, not good enough. When drying the first one the second on you own can be put to use; so if you decant more than one bottle of wine in an evening; get two.
customer_reviews.author: PJDSR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Was the perfect addition to my Easter table.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mikulski

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, thick no lead glass, heavy to the hand, nice shape.
customer_reviews.author: TThomas

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality but some people may find it a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but some people may find it a little difficult inverting it completely to empty all the contents of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: If you are a red wine drinker you need a decanter
customer_reviews.text: This is great for those reds wines that just need to breath for a little bit. Wait about an hour, pour, and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: V. Edwards

product_meta.title: Wine Enthusiast Lead-Free Crystal Vivid Wine Decanter 750 ML
feature_bullets: IDEAL FOR GIFTING - Handmade in Europe, the sleek classic design of the Vivid Wine Decanter by Wine Enthusiast is both stylish and refined; making it the perfect way to indulge your favorite wine connoisseur.

LARGE CAPACITY - Holds up to a full 47 oz (nearly 2 bottles) of wine, the durable wide-based design of the decanter maximizes the breathable surface area. An ergonomic neck and spout allows you to effortless decant and pour an entire 750 ml bottle of wine.
ENHANCES FLAVOR - Let your wine open and breath. The large surface area allows for easier oxygenation; allowing the wine to fully aerate for a more expressive aromatic flavor and smoother finish.

ELEGANT CENTERPIECE - Don't be fooled by cheap mass-produced imitations. Formed with a thick wall of high-quality mouth-blown lead-free crystal glass the Vivid decanter is nothing short of a masterpiece. Place it as a tabletop centerpieces or simply display it as a work of art.
MAINTENANCE - Keep your wine carafe sparkling by hand washing with soap and water and air drying. Measures 9.25" tall.
